item.description:
Join us as we check out the next restaurant in our North End dinner series- Riccardo's Ristorante. This restaurant got good reviews on Yelp and has a wide variety of menu items at reasonable prices. We will be enjoying dinner, then heading to the Living Room, a lounge/bar nearby for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink.

 

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP. Please don't sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you will attend- it takes a spot away from someone who really wants to go. Thank you for your assistance!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Join us for a North End Dinner & Drinks Series: Riccardo's Ristorante
